      • parseSinCos

        public java.lang.String parseSinCos(java.lang.String input)
        Parse sinus and cosinus to correct value for calculation. I don't know why but the mathjs library makes bad calculations for sinus and cosinus greater than 360ยบ/2*PI. This is the reason why it should be parsed.
        Parameters:
        number - Number to parse.
        m - Matcher.
        input - String.
        Returns:
        Parsed number.
